golden_diagnosis: 尼曼匹克病B型/Niemann-Pick disease type B; NPD-B/Chronic visceral acid sphingomyelinase deficiency/Niemann-pick disease, type B,尼曼匹克病B型/Niemann-Pick disease type B; NPD-B/Chronic visceral acid sphingomyelinase deficiency/Niemann-pick disease, type B,尼曼匹克病B型/Niemann-Pick disease type B; NPD-B/Chronic visceral acid sphingomyelinase deficiency/Niemann-pick disease, type B,尼曼匹克病C型/Niemann-Pick disease type C; NPD-C/Niemann-Pick disease type C/Niemann-pick disease, type C1,尼曼匹克病C型/Niemann-Pick disease type C; NPD-C/Niemann-Pick disease type C/Niemann-pick disease, type C1,尼曼匹克病C型/Niemann-Pick disease type C; NPD-C/Niemann-Pick disease type C/Niemann-pick disease, type C1,Niemann-pick disease, type C2,尼曼匹克病A型/Niemann-Pick disease type A; NPD-A/Niemann-Pick disease, type A,尼曼匹克病A型/Niemann-Pick disease type A; NPD-A/Niemann-Pick disease, type A
predict_diagnosis:
1. Metabolic disorder with intellectual disability and neurological manifestations (e.g., mitochondrial disease)
2. Genetic syndrome with intellectual disability, seizures, and dysmorphic features (e.g., tuberous sclerosis complex)
3. Neuromuscular disorder with intellectual disability and gait disturbance (e.g., spinal muscular atrophy)
4. Storage disease with intellectual disability and splenomegaly (e.g., Pompe disease)
5. Genetic disorder with intellectual disability, dysarthria, and tetany (e.g., fragile X syndrome)
6. Infection or inflammation of the central nervous system (e.g., tuberculosis meningitis, encephalitis)
7. Developmental brain malformation with intellectual disability and seizures (e.g., polymicrogyria, lissencephaly)
8. Genetic disorder with intellectual disability and abnormal lung morphology (e.g., cystic fibrosis)
9. Disorder of connective tissue with intellectual disability and gait disturbance (e.g., Ehlers-Danlos syndrome)
10. Congenital anomaly with intellectual disability and abnormal maxillary sinus (e.g., Goldenhar syndrome)
